text: [Music]
hi I'm manushka a technical customer
service specialist at the AWS office in
cap toown South Africa today I'll show
you how to request a vcpu service quow
to increase for your Amazon elastic
compute Cloud on demand instance let's
get
started to request an increase in your
ec2 on demand instance you must first
determine the number of vcpus that your
OnDemand instance uses then compare this
number against the vcpu based quoters
use these values to determine the
appropriate service quote to increase to
request before you request that increase
it's best practice to calculate the vcpu
value that you need based on the
instance
types when you have this information
open the AWS Management console and then
select the region where you need the
vcpu
increase then open the Service Cod
dashboard in the left navigation bar
click on AW
services in the list of aw Services
choose Amazon elastic compute
Cloud next you see a list of your
current ec2 quoters find and select the
quoter name for the instance type you
want to
increase for example if you want to
increase your quota for M5 instances
select running on demand instances voter
then choose request increase at account
level enter the new vcpu limit
value finally choose request note that
quota increases apply for each AWS
region you must request increases for
each region where you need more vcpu
resources so now you know how to request
a vcpu service quot to increase for your
Amazon ec2 on Demand
instance thanks for watching and happy
cloud computing from all of us here at
AWS
[Music]
